meanings.definition: The quality of being disposable or easily discarded.
meanings.sent1: The disposabilities of plastic cutlery make them convenient for picnics.
meanings.sent2: We should consider the disposabilities of paper plates when planning the party.
meanings.sent3: The disposabilities of tissues come in handy during cold season.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship had the disposabilities of a paper cup, easily discarded when no longer needed.
meanings.sent5: The disposabilities of plastic bags harm the environment if not properly disposed of.

meanings.definition: Items that are intended to be thrown away after use.
meanings.sent1: The disposabilities of fast food packaging contribute to environmental pollution.
meanings.sent2: Single-use straws are classic examples of disposabilities in our daily lives.
meanings.sent3: The disposabilities of party hats make them perfect for one-time celebrations.
meanings.sent4: The disposabilities of disposable cameras make them ideal for capturing memories on the go.
meanings.sent5: The disposabilities of expired medications ensure they are safely disposed of to avoid harm.
